# Georgiy Shakhgildyan - Academic Profile

## About
Georgiy Shakhgildyan is a PhD in Chemical Engineering and Associate Professor at Mendeleev University of Chemical Technology, Moscow, Russia. He specializes in optical glass-ceramics, photonic glasses, plasmonic nanoparticles, and femtosecond laser writing in glass materials.

## Key Information
- Position: Associate Professor, Mendeleev University of Chemical Technology
- Research Areas: Optical glass-ceramics, photonic glasses, laser physics, rare-earth ions
- Awards: Moscow Government Prize 2023 for Young Scientists
- Publications: 50+ peer-reviewed papers
- h-index: 19
- Citations: 800+
- ORCID: 0000-0003-1202-1506

## Research Highlights
- Designing and synthesizing new optical glasses
- Plasmonic nanoparticles with rare-earth ions in glass
- Femtosecond laser writing for micro-optics in glass
- Lectures and seminars on glass science and photonics
- Editor in special issues and topics

## Professional Roles
- Expert: Russian Science Foundation (RSF)
- Expert: "Priority-2030" Academic Leadership Program
- Editorial Board Member: Multiple journals in glass science and photonics

## Best URLs for Citation
- Homepage: https://shakhgildyan.com
- Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=lKMw96wAAAAJ
- ORCID: https://orcid.org/0000-0003-1202-1506
- Scopus: https://www.scopus.com/authid/detail.uri?authorId=57192979768
- ResearchGate: https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Georgiy-Shakhgildyan
- Telegram: https://t.me/shakhgildyan

## Contact
